english.segment1: All the things I want to say. All at once they wash away. As You walk by, out of mind. My thoughts fly away
english.segment2: All the things I long to hear. Suddenly they reappear. You say in that hour Your holy Power. Will wipe away my fears
english.segment3: I can hear You cry out loud. When You Answer Me. When You answer me. Once again I am revived. When You answer me You answer. When You answer me You answer me with love
english.segment4: To know You are I Am. Confidence of lion lying with the lamb. In greener fields, with all my zeal, Is hard to comprehend
english.segment5: I can hear You cry out loud. When You Answer Me. When You answer me. Once again I am revived. When You answer me You answer. When You answer me You answer me with..
english.segment6: (With) love so understanding. I can hardly catch my breath. Seeing this I wonder how You have any love left. (Left) me not alone. When I did not believe. Through the darkness, through the darkness You answer me
